content: Endowment Policies Insurance Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Apr 2019Etiqa Elastiq vs SAVE3?Any advice on these 2? Seems like Elastiq more for short-term and “just in case need cash” scenarios and SAVE3 for those with spare cash since locked for 6 years?1 answerAnswerBump0

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Apr 2019Yes correct. Both are universal life as their base investment is in bonds.Other than time period, please read through the product summary / brochure for exclusion and Conditions since they do not pay interest for special conditions.0 comments0
